mods.note: Included in a bound volume of sheet music once owned by Tennessee resident, Miss Nora Gardner, this particular piece is part of a compilation entitled "Short Visits. A Collection of Beautiful Pieces arranged in an easy styule for the Piano," and is listed as number 12. On the same page, the words "Nora L. Gardner Columbia, Tenn Jan 1st 1862" are written in pencil in the top right-hand corner. On the last page there is an advertisement for a new publication from Charles Grobe.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
